component.text: Configuring Passive Interfaces with EIGRP for IPv4
Verifying the Passive Interface with EIGRP for IPv4

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands:
Configure R2 to suppress EIGRP hello packets on its GigabitEthernet 0/0 interface while still advertising that network in EIGRP updates.
Perform the tasks in the following order:
  • Enter router configuration mode using AS 1.
  • Configure passive interface.
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode.
  • Verify the passive interface by examining the protocol information.
